name: Doki Theme
description: Add Anime Characters to Geometry Dash!

CustomStickerPath.name: Custom Sticker Path
CustomStickerPath.description: Choose a custom sticker to display

UseCustomSticker.name: Use Custom Sticker
UseCustomSticker.description: Override the Sticker Slider and use a custom sticker

StickerSlider.name: Sticker
StickerSlider.description:
Choose a sticker from here. Stickers include:
0: Fully transparent sticker (visually a softtoggle)
1: Essex, 2: Sleepy Kanna, 3: Kanna, 4: Mai, 5: Ram
6: Rem, 7: Rias, 8: Yuno, 9: Ryuko, 10: Nagatoro

xPosPercent.name: Sticker X Position (%)
xPosPercent.description: Sets the position of the sticker as a percentage of the width of your screen.

yPosPercent.name: Sticker Y Position (%)
yPosPercent.description: Sets the position of the sticker as a percentage of the height of your screen.

Scale.name: Scale
Scale.description: Sets the scale of the sticker.

BackgroundSlider.name: Background (Editor Only)
BackgroundSlider.description:
Choose a level editor background from here. Backgrounds include:
0: Fully transparent background (visually a softtoggle)
1: Aqua, 2: Astolfo, 3: Asuna, 4: Azuki, 5: Beatrice, 6: Cinnamon, 7: Coconut, 8: Darkness, 9: Echidna
10: Gray
